page.title: 06DIALECT/SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
was now under the{Scots}influence. { {Shetland}people either talk very quick or very slow with a broad accent.This and different sentence structure can make it quite difficult to understand. Past tense isn't used a lot eg.not bled,but blooding.
We do not have much evidence of supernatural happenings and the few there are have to do with the { {Airport.}In 1979 a Dan Air 748 crashed and 17 were killed.Cleaners of the terminal have claimed to have seen the ghost of the pilot walking around the building.In an old house in the South of our area an old woman was supposed to roam.She dissappeared when the house was knocked down for road improvents.A pilot and his family were moving from {Scatness.}As their plane neared {Aberdeen }the wife
